name: 凯德里克·布朗
name_full: 凯德里克·布朗 Kedrick Brown
introduction: Houston made and Littlerock raised, American actor, Kedrick Brown is making major waves in Hollywood. This talented actor is catching the attention of major network execs, directors and producers throughout the film and television world. You have seen him in principal and recurring roles on the NBC new hit medical show, New Amsterdam, Oscar Award Winning Cuba Gooding Jr. 's theatrical directorial debut, Bayou Caviar, the hit CW superhero show, Black Lightning (Season 2&3), the much-anticipated horror film sequel executive produced by Spike Lee, Tales From The Hood 2, the hit lifetime TV movie, Surviving Compton, Oprah Winfrey's critically acclaimed drama series, Greenleaf, John Legend's executive produced series Underground, and John Ridley's critically-acclaimed ABC crime drama American Crime.
